title: Please enable DSDS feature on pixel 3 xl at least in next Android version. Eagerly waiting for this.
content: I was disappointed with pixel 3 xl is not supporting DSDS. Please enable DSDS feature on pixel 3 XL in atleast next Android 11 version. really appreciate if you could enable DSDS on pixel 3 xl so that we can use and enjoy both esim and sim at a time. Thanks in advance üòäüëç
